H0.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1870

H1.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1875

H2.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1879

H3.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1882

A4.text: In 1895, US President Grover Cleveland sponsored the first electrically lit Christmas tree in the White House.

A5.text: He proudly displayed his Christmas tree, which was hand-wired with 80 red, white and blue electric incandescent light bulbs the size of walnuts, in December 1882 at his home near Fifth Avenue in New York City.
